requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP or newer
  • Processor: Pentium III 800Mhz
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphic card compatible with DirectX 9
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
